DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine use Occlusal Support Device ( OSD ) ( Mouthguard ) reduce duration intensity second stage labor , reduce incidence labor complication include Caesarian Sections improve Apgar score newborn
DOC.brief_title: Use Occlusal Support Device During Second Stage Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Prolonged labor , especially second stage active expulsive effort ( push phase ) , associate increase risk maternal complication ( e.g . tissue trauma , postpartum hemorrhage , intra-amniotic infection ) . Developing effective method assist maximize maternal expulsion effort great value reduce number complication , also include cesarean section instrumental delivery . Past study publish dental literature show specially design oral appliance support dental occlusion may increase isometric strength different muscle group . Increased strength neck muscle could improve efficiency Valsalva maneuver increase intra-uterine pressure , thus decrease duration phase II labor . Nulliparous woman uncomplicated singleton pregnancy randomly assign either study group ( Dental appliance ) dental appliance group . Duration labor measure phase I phase II . Rates cesarean section instrument delivery complication chart well Apgar score .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous woman Uncomplicated pregnancy Singleton pregnancy Unable provide inform consent comply study protocol , High risk and/or complicate pregnancy , Have multiple fetus diagnose ultrasound , Have extensive decay multiple broken/missing teeth interfere fabrication OSD
